Make calls to the github API

Source: R/github.R
github_api.Rd

Make calls to the github API

github_api(path, proxy_url = NULL)

Arguments

path

Character string with path to the API resource
proxy_url

Character string defining a network proxy in the form host:port. Default is NULL in which case the API call will not use a proxy

Value

A list of class github_api containing the parsed content, API resource path and the response object

Examples

github_api("repos/Rapporteket/sship/branches")

#> $content
#>       name                               commit.sha
#> 1 gh-pages be5f317b79c52a1d09c0db35a243afb8a5f39b3f
#> 2     main a041cd02b5bb2913db162f8f98a68737ca878325
#>                                                                                        commit.url
#> 1 https://api.github.com/repos/Rapporteket/sship/commits/be5f317b79c52a1d09c0db35a243afb8a5f39b3f
#> 2 https://api.github.com/repos/Rapporteket/sship/commits/a041cd02b5bb2913db162f8f98a68737ca878325
#>   protected
#> 1     FALSE
#> 2      TRUE
#> 
#> $path
#> [1] "repos/Rapporteket/sship/branches"
#> 
#> $response
#> Response [https://api.github.com/repos/Rapporteket/sship/branches]
#>   Date: 2021-09-01 12:36
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
#>   Size: 400 B
#> 
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "github_api"
